mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CI_CONTENT_CATEGORY ( id, code, lastUpdateDate, lastUpdateOperatorId, name, typeCode, level, orderIndex, valid, createDate, createOperatorId, modifyAble, parentId, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateOperatorId}, #{name}, #{type.code}, #{level}, #{orderIndex}, #{valid}, #{createDate}, #{createOperatorId}, #{modifyAble}, #{parent.id}, #{remark} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE CI_CONTENT_CATEGORY
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateOperatorId = #{lastUpdateOperatorId,javaType=java.lang.String},
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
typeCode = #{type.code,javaType=java.lang.String},
level = #{level,javaType=int},
orderIndex = #{orderIndex,javaType=int},
valid = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
modifyAble = #{modifyAble,javaType=boolean},
parentId = #{parent.id,javaType=java.lang.String},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
AND code = #{code}
